name: Shadow Eclipse
description:
Shadow Eclipse is a rougelite dungeon crawler focused on magic, darkness, unique builds, difficulty, and replayability.

Features

  • Challenging: Battle your way through increasingly difficult levels and see how far you can push your mage and develop a unique spell build! Bosses guard entryway to further levels.
  • Multiplayer: Play by yourself or host and share a lobby code with friends. Rooms in each level are laid out in a grid and grow wider depending on the number of players. The more rooms you can explore, the more spell upgrades you will find!
  • Build Diversity: Each room you clear drops randomized spell upgrades resulting in different mage builds every playthrough. Your mage can only know 3 spells at a time, forcing you to identify spell combinations, and make decisions about which spells to hold onto and which to forget.
